alert.note: Alert for Cayuga; Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Oneida; Onondaga; Otsego; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 4:43PM EDT until April 01 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Oneida County in central New York... Western Otsego County in central New York... Madison County in central New York... Eastern Cayuga County in central New York... Cortland County in central New York... Onondaga County in central New York... Eastern Tompkins County in central New York... Northern Chenango County in central New York... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 442 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Camillus to Marathon, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Onondaga, Syracuse, Rome, Auburn, De Witt, Cortland, Sullivan, Oneida, Lenox and Pompey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cayuga; Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Oneida; Onondaga; Otsego; Tompkins
